name: Diggy (Asue, Oxalotte)
description:
Hello :)

Diggy is a 2D game made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 48. The theme was "Deeper and deeper".

Your goal is to find the coin to finish the level. You have to dig and spawn blocks to get there.

Controls

Action Keyboard / Mouse Move & JumpWASD / ZQSD / Arrows
DigLeft Mouse Button Spawn blockRight Mouse ButtonPause Escape RestartR

Team

-> Asue : game developer

-> Oxalotte : composed all the musics
